text.page:
523
096-262a @#/ /rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags su sku mdog gser 'dra ba/ /shes rab rtags su ral gri po ti phyag na bsnams/ /'phags pa 'jam

524
096-262b dpal gzhon nu'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /thugs rje'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i 'od chags pa/ /skyon gyis ma gos phyag mtshan phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /chos nyid mi 'gyur rtags su sku mdog mthing nag sngo/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /rigs gsum gyi bkra shis rdzogs s+ho//
